Gravity would be stronger andainable, allowing for the creation of massive structures and landscapes that defy Earth's laws of gravity.
The speed of light would be slower, allowing for more time to experience and observe the universe.
Time would flow in reverse, allowing for the creation of time loops and the ability to revisit past events.
The laws of physics would be different, allowing for the creation of new forms of energy and technology.
The universe would be populated by different forms of life, some of which may be hostile to humans and require special precautions to interact with.
